<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Courageous Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=1649) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[warrior muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

With a mighty shout, you can stir an ally to attack. If your next action is to cast the [_inspire courage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=386) composition cantrip, one ally who gains a status bonus from the spell can immediately use a reaction to make a melee Strike.

<title level="2">Courageous Assault leads to...</title>
[Courageous Onslaught](/Feats.aspx?ID=1658), [Shared Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=1654)
name: Courageous Assault
